job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pstrongJob DescriptionstrongppIf you are an affable and talented data scientist with excellent attention to detail who enjoys a flexible fastpaced work environment Adlumin is the place for you We are a growing startup in Washington DC running a cloudnative machine learningempowered Security Information and Event Management SIEM platform Our clients range from small regional financial institutions to multinational corporationsppThe Data Science team at Adlumin collaborates with a team of engineers to automate the ingestion of security logs into the cloud and builds machine learning solutions for empowering IT security These applications have immediate impact on Adlumin clients boosting their ability to effectively monitor billions of log messages through online model scoring and highly informative alerts on events that warrant further investigation You will be joining a team of data scientists committed to cuttingedge research in anomaly detection The general use case is relatively new and therefore offers the opportunity to write breakthrough algorithms using unsupervised modeling techniques on a wide range of data typesppbrppstrongTHIS IS NOT A REMOTE POSITION  CANDIDATES MUST RESIDE IN OR BE RELOCATING TO THE WASHINGTON DC METRO AREA AND MUST BE US CITIZENS WE OFFER SUBSTANTIAL FLEXIBILITY ON WORKING FROM HOME NOT OPEN TO RECRUITERSstrongppbrppstrongRequired QualificationsstrongpulliBachelors Degree in STEM field advanced degree a pluslili24 years experience in a machine learning developer role and general familiarity with all relevant Python librariesliliNonSTEM degree combined with long track record in data mining will be considered especially candidates with exposure to cloud data solutions andor cybersecurity domain knowledgeliliFluency in anomaly detection techniques and unsupervised methodsliliIdeal candidate will have strong theoretical foundation in the main categories of machine learning techniques and sharp intuition for commercial applicationliliAttention to detailliliAn ability to adapt to change in a fastpaced environmentwe are a small agile team and require someone who can roll with changes and hit the gas when its time to moveliliEffective and proven time management skillsyou have to be someone we can count on to deliver on time every timeliliTopnotch communication skillsthe kind you use to engage team members and interact with clientsliliUS CitizenshipliulpstrongWhat You Will Be DoingstrongpulliDevelop and own 34 distinct algorithms targeting different data streams solving unique challenges in terms of data ingestion model training and model inferenceliliSolve technical challenges specific to keeping machine learning applications compatible with the cloud architecture in place being especially mindful of compute capacity optimization issues inherent in the platformliliUtilize AWS services such as Kinesis Firehose Glue Athena and Lambda as building blocks for the functions listed above and algorithm deployment functionalities in such services as CodePipeline and SageMakerliliCommunicate with clients on occasion to explain the intricacies of a given machine learning algorithm and clarify the intuition behind a particular detection or alertliliWrite documentation and perform monitoring and performance evaluation on models under ownership and recommend development plans for future iterations and patchesliliDevelop and maintain cloudbased platforms for safely testing new algorithms prior to deployment and for change managementliliWork on government contracts for delivering customized machine learning and analytics solutions meeting client expectations and solving challenges specific to the clients data environmentliliProvide subject matter expertise to the team in chosen area of machine learning such as graphbased techniques dimensionality reduction and timeseriesliliPartner with peers in the broader Product Engineering organization within Adlumin to streamline interactions between backend and frontend teams and reduce bottlenecks in the developmentdeployment processliliInfluence peers and leadership to advance promising solutionsliulpstrongFeatured BenefitsstrongpulliFull MedicalDentalVision InsuranceliliUnlimited VacationliliBonus and stock option packagesliulpbrp
